definition: variant of 因特網|因特网[Yin1 te4 wang3], Internet
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: ARGs could not have existed before the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 在英特網之前是不可能出現虛擬現實遊戲的。

sentences.english: You can do almost anything on the Internet these days.
sentences.chinese: 現如今你幾乎能在英特網上做任何事。

sentences.english: The Internet constructs new community consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 英特網構建了新的社區意識。

sentences.english: No. In the days when the Internet was young, our hopes were high.
sentences.chinese: 在英特網初期的時候，我們對它寄予很高的期望。

sentences.english: And many people say that's the technical ancestor of today's Internet.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾巴網被許多人認爲是當今英特網的前身。

sentences.english: Do you think the Internet should be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲英特網應該獲得這次的諾貝爾和平獎麼？

sentences.english: IVS (INRIA Videoconferencing System) is a widely deployed videoconferencing system for the internet.
sentences.chinese: 是英特網上廣泛使用的視頻會議系統。

sentences.english: Never mind the technical details of whether the Internet really has an operating system or not.
sentences.chinese: 不必糾結於英特網是否存在操作系統這個技術細節。

sentences.english: The Internet created the possibility of noncommercial publications of public domain works.
sentences.chinese: 英特網開創了共享領域作品非商業化發行的可能性。

sentences.english: You can do it on a computer and share it through the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在計算機上通過英特網辦得到。

sentences.english: And the country only recently established its first full connection to the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮也只是在最近建立了它第一個連接連入英特網。

sentences.english: The use of Internet is an epoch-making event.
sentences.chinese: 英特網的使用是一個劃時代的事件。
